name:
Animal Crossing™: New Leaf - 
Welcome amiibo
description:
Please note: If you already own "Animal Crossing: New Leaf", you can update your game to "Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo" with the free update downloadable via eShop.

An exciting new life awaits you in
Animal Crossing: New Leaf!

Have you ever wanted a new home, a
new job, a new life? There's one
waiting for you in Animal Crossing:
New Leaf! Move to a new town and
become mayor, then live life at your
own pace; make new friends, have all
kinds of experiences and create the
town of your dreams!

Supports 4 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play.

Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
